sqlMap.statement: select DISTINCT t0.toolkey,t0.tbkey,t0.toolname,t0.imgurl,t0.url,t0.uptoolkey,t0.toollevel,t0.dispseq,t0.flag, t0.createdate,t0.creator,t0.modifydate,t0.modifier from t00_tool t0,T00_ROLE_AUTH t1,T00_COM_AUTH t2 where t0.uptoolkey = #uptoolkey# and t0.tbkey =#tbkey# and t1.rolekey = t2.ROLEKEY and t0.toolkey = t1.MODULEKEY AND t2.USERNAME = #creator# AND t2.GROUPKEY = #modifier# UNION ALL SELECT t0.toolkey,t0.tbkey,t0.toolname,t0.imgurl,t0.url,t0.uptoolkey,t0.toollevel,t0.dispseq,t0.flag,t0.createdate,t0.creator,t0.modifydate,t0.modifier FROM t00_tool t0 where t0.uptoolkey = #uptoolkey# AND t0.TOOLKEY NOT LIKE '%T%'
